=== About Me ===

Hello everyone! I'm just a guy from Myanmar who crazy about Ubuntu. I'm a Sr. Mangement Information System Technician of <nowiki>[[http://www.mprlexp.com|MPRL E&P Pte Ltd]]</nowiki> and now volunteering in Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team. I'm an enthusiast of IT and cheerfully support to Open Source though I got MCSE:Security certification ;). I do networking, server administration, web and application develpment.

=== Contributions ===

I made some Ubuntu application such as <nowiki>[[https://github.com/seriousblaze/zproxy|Zproxy]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://github.com/seriousblaze/mm_FontSwitcher|MMFontSwitcher]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/my-fs-cli|my-fs-cli]]</nowiki>, Gedit Plugin for <nowiki>[[http://code.google.com/p/python-myanmar/|Python-Myanmar]]</nowiki> Font Converter, <nowiki>[[https://github.com/seriousblaze/clip-text-convert/|Clip-Text-Convert]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://github.com/seriousblaze/mm-kb|Burmese Keyboards]]</nowiki> and other useful shell scripts which are dedicated to Ubuntu users in Myanmar. I write <nowiki>[[http://nym.ubuntu-mm.net|Blog]]</nowiki> posts about my experience in Ubuntu and Open Source Softwares, moreover, I'm a contributor of Localized Ubuntu-based Distro, <nowiki>[[http://tharlon.org/|TharLon]]</nowiki>. I always participate in every contribution of Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team.
